arb-ltipp.title: Beefy LTIPP
arb-ltipp.description: Earn extra incentives awarded to Beefy's CLM through Arbitrum's incentives program. Users earn extra $ARB tokens for staking into selected CLMs, while trading fees get automatically claimed and compounded back into the position.

zap-v3.title: Zap V3 Launch
zap-v3.description: Celebrate Zap V3 launch with Beefy's Optimism Governance Fund campaign. Users earn $OP tokens for utilizing Zap V3 on Optimism, with monthly rewards and partner launchpool boosts on select vaults.
